title: Check your Skill Ratings
description: Check your roles Skill Rating directly from Discord!

title: Check your stats
description: Check both your quick play and competitive stats in a single embed, so you can easily compare them.

title: Connect your profiles
description: Connect up to 5 profiles to your Discord ID without using any external links. Upgrade to Premium to be able to connect more profiles!

title: Fun
description: Ask OverBot a role, hero or map to play next! Play Overwatch trivia while you're waiting for a game or enjoy some Overwatch memes!

title: News and more
description: Check the latest Overwatch news, patch notes and server status information.
